name: docs02
title: Docs02
desc: The Docs02 is a sleek and modern theme designed for documentation sites. It offers a clean layout, beautiful typography, and a focus on readability to ensure that your documentation shines. It is made from Astro Starlight, providing a foundation for its design and functionality. Astro Starlight is a versatile framework for building full-featured documentation themes.
article:
The Docs02 is a sleek and modern theme designed for documentation sites. It offers a clean layout, beautiful typography, and a focus on readability to ensure that your documentation shines.

It is made from Astro Starlight, providing a foundation for its design and functionality. Astro Starlight is a versatile framework for building full-featured documentation themes.

Features

  • MDX Support: Write rich and interactive content with MDX, combining markdown with JSX syntax.
  • Tailwind CSS: Utilizes the power of Tailwind CSS for easy and efficient styling.
  • Responsive Design: Your documentation will look great on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
  • Dark Mode: Users can switch between light and dark modes for comfortable reading in any environment.
  • Syntax Highlighting: Code snippets are beautifully styled with syntax highlighting for various programming languages.
  • Customizable: Easily customize the theme to match your brand with built-in customization options.
  • Table of Contents: Automatically generated table of contents for easy navigation within long documents.
  • Search: Integrated search functionality helps users quickly find what they need.

Getting Started

Check out the documentation to learn how to add data in these theme
